document_title: Hyperhidrosis: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
Excessive sweating can be a symptom of other very serious conditions. Therefore, if you experience one of the symptoms below, see a doctor to find the cause and intervene promptly:
Sweating accompanied by unintentional weight loss; Sweating mainly occurs during sleep; Sweating accompanied by fever, chest pain, chest tightness, shortness of breath, and rapid heartbeat; Prolonged sweating of unknown cause
